names.pinyin: xiao zhi mo dao tan tang

actions: Promotes the movement of Qi, reduces distention and pressure and resolves hardenings.
Promotes urination, leaches out Damp-ness, strengthens the Spleen and transforms Phlegm.
With Zhi Ban Xia, treats Phlegm, thin mucus and turbid Dampness.
Promotes urination and drains Heat from the Urinary Bladder.
Invigorates the Blood and promotes the movement of Qi.
Releases the Exterior, expels External Wind and expels Wind-Dampness.
With Zhi Tian Nan Xing, for headache, generalized body aches and numbness due to Wind-Phlegm Obstructing the channels.
With Chuan Xiong, for headache and generalized body aches and pains associated with the common cold or painful obstruction.
Promotes urination, clears Damp-Heat and expels Phlegm.
